verses.name: Psalms 94:14
verses.text: For the Lord will not cast off his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.

verses.name: Psalms 94:15
verses.text: But judgment shall return unto righteousness: and all the upright in heart shall follow it.

verses.name: Psalms 94:16
verses.text: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?

verses.name: Psalms 94:17
verses.text: Unless the Lord had been my help, my soul had almost dwelt in silence.

verses.name: Psalms 94:18
verses.text: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O Lord, held me up.

verses.name: Psalms 94:19
verses.text: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.
